column1: Smoque BBQ////Came here with Kevin N. to satisfy my inner white/southern girl (as he would call it). We had the sliced beef brisket
column3: rib combo (St. Louis and Baby Back) with slaw
column6: and cornbread. While I can't say this is the best bbq I've ever tasted
column7: it did the job. The beef brisket was very tender and juicy and the ribs fell off the bones
column8: just the way I like it. The bbq sauces were delicious and gave the meats that extra umph it needed. The baked beans is a must. On a week night
column9: it took about 30-40 minutes for us to order and get a table.
